name: This Box Is Just Right
description: Congratulations, you just landed your dream job working customer service in the returns department! Soon you'll feel the nonstop rush exchanging various objects for others. Quickly search in the back room for a replacement item of similar height or volume. Once selected, click the bell to let the customer know you found their new item. If they are happy they'll give you a tip. Pick poorly though, and they may require some money of yours to be appeased. Serve as many customers as you can before you run out of money.  Good Luck!
